document.title: WEL_PROGRESS_BAR
document.paragraph:
A ../../reference/controls/WEL_PROGRESS_BAR_chart.xmlWEL_PROGRESS_BAR control is an encapsulation of the Win32 progress bar. It can be used to display the progress of a lengthy operation.
Note: By specifying the style Pbs_vertical, the progress bar will be displayed vertically.
